/* This example requires Tailwind CSS v2.0+ */ import { Fragment } from 'react' import { ShoppingBagIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline' import { Popover, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' export default function ShoppingMenu() { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart.value); console.log(cart); cart.map(product => { console.log(product); }) return ( <> {/* Cart */} {cart.length} items in cart, view bag

Shopping Cart

    {cart.map((item) => (

  • {item.product.name}

    {item.product.colour}

    • ))}

View Shopping Bag

) }
